verses.text: \w But|strong="H7200"\w* \w there|strong="H3427"\w* \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H5971"\w* \w no|strong="H7200"\w* \w more|strong="H1419"\w* \w gloom|strong="H6757"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w was|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* anguish. \w In|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* former \w time|strong="H5921"\w*, \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w brought|strong="H1980"\w* \w into|strong="H1980"\w* contempt \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w of|strong="H3427"\w* Zebulun \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w of|strong="H3427"\w* Naphtali; \w but|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* latter \w time|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w has|strong="H5971"\w* \w made|strong="H1980"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* glorious, \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w way|strong="H1980"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sea, \w beyond|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Jordan, Galilee \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w nations|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w people|strong="H1471"\w* \w who|strong="H1471"\w* walked \w in|strong="H6440"\w* darkness \w have|strong="H1471"\w* seen \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1431"\w* light. \w The|strong="H6440"\w* light \w has|strong="H1471"\w* shined \w on|strong="H6440"\w* those \w who|strong="H1471"\w* lived \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* shadow \w of|strong="H6440"\w* death.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* multiplied \w the|strong="H3588"\w* nation. \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* increased \w their|strong="H3588"\w* joy. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* rejoice \w before|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* according \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* joy \w in|strong="H3117"\w* harvest, \w as|strong="H3117"\w* men rejoice \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* divide \w the|strong="H3588"\w* plunder.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* yoke \w of|strong="H1818"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* burden, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* staff \w of|strong="H1818"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* shoulder, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rod \w of|strong="H1818"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* oppressor, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* broken \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H1556"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* day \w of|strong="H1818"\w* Midian.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* armour \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* armed \w man|strong="H1368"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* noisy battle, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* garments rolled \w in|strong="H5921"\w* blood, \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* burning, fuel \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* fire.

\w For|strong="H5704"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* child \w is|strong="H3068"\w* born \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* son \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w government|strong="H4951"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* shoulders. \w His|strong="H3068"\w* name \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* called Wonderful Counsellor, Mighty \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w Everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* Father, Prince \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

\w Of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* increase \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* government \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* peace \w there|strong="H1697"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w no|strong="H7971"\w* end, \w on|strong="H5307"\w* \w David|strong="H7971"\w*’s throne, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w on|strong="H5307"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* kingdom, \w to|strong="H3478"\w* establish \w it|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* uphold \w it|strong="H7971"\w* \w with|strong="H1697"\w* justice \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w with|strong="H1697"\w* righteousness \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w time|strong="H3478"\w* \w on|strong="H5307"\w*, even forever. \w The|strong="H7971"\w* zeal \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* Hosts \w will|strong="H3478"\w* perform \w this|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* Lord sent \w a|strong="H3068"\w* word \w into|strong="H3045"\w* Jacob, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w it|strong="H3045"\w* falls \w on|strong="H3427"\w* \w Israel|strong="H5971"\w*.

All \w the|strong="H1129"\w* people \w will|strong="H5307"\w* know, including Ephraim \w and|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H1129"\w* inhabitants \w of|strong="H5307"\w* Samaria, \w who|strong="H1129"\w* say \w in|strong="H1129"\w* pride \w and|strong="H5307"\w* \w in|strong="H1129"\w* arrogance \w of|strong="H5307"\w* heart,

“\w The|strong="H5921"\w* bricks \w have|strong="H3068"\w* fallen, \w but|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* build \w with|strong="H3068"\w* cut stone. \w The|strong="H5921"\w* sycamore fig trees \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H3068"\w* cut \w down|strong="H5921"\w*, \w but|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H3068"\w* cedars \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* place.”

\w Therefore|strong="H2063"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w set|strong="H3478"\w* \w up|strong="H3605"\w* \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w high|strong="H5186"\w* \w against|strong="H3027"\w* \w him|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* adversaries \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Rezin, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* stir \w up|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w enemies|strong="H3027"\w*,

\w The|strong="H5221"\w* Syrians \w in|strong="H3068"\w* front, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* Philistines behind; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* devour \w Israel|strong="H5971"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* open mouth. \w For|strong="H5704"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H7725"\w*, \w his|strong="H3068"\w* anger \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* hand \w is|strong="H3068"\w* stretched \w out|strong="H1875"\w* \w still|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w Yet|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* people \w have|strong="H3068"\w* not \w turned|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w him|strong="H3772"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* struck \w them|strong="H3117"\w*, neither \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* sought \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Hosts.

Therefore \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1931"\w* cut \w off|strong="H5375"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* Israel \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w tail|strong="H2180"\w*, palm branch \w and|strong="H7218"\w* reed, \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w one|strong="H1931"\w* day.

\w The|strong="H1961"\w* elder \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* honourable \w man|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* head, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* prophet \w who|strong="H5971"\w* teaches \w lies|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* tail.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* lead \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* lead \w them|strong="H5921"\w* astray; \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* led \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord \w will|strong="H3293"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* rejoice over \w their|strong="H3588"\w* young men, neither \w will|strong="H3293"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* compassion \w on|strong="H3341"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* fatherless \w and|strong="H8068"\w* widows; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* everyone \w is|strong="H3588"\w* profane \w and|strong="H8068"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* evildoer, \w and|strong="H8068"\w* \w every|strong="H3588"\w* mouth speaks folly. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* all \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* anger \w is|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* turned \w away|strong="H1197"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* hand \w is|strong="H3588"\w* stretched out \w still|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* wickedness burns \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fire. \w It|strong="H1961"\w* devours \w the|strong="H3068"\w* briers \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thorns; yes, \w it|strong="H1961"\w* kindles \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* thickets \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* forest, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* roll upward \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* column \w of|strong="H3068"\w* smoke.

\w Through|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Hosts’ wrath, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w is|strong="H1320"\w* burnt \w up|strong="H5921"\w*; \w and|strong="H1320"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H1320"\w* \w are|strong="H1320"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* fuel \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* fire. \w No|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* spares \w his|strong="H5921"\w* brother.

\w One|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H3063"\w* devour \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* right \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* hungry; \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H3063"\w* eat \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w left|strong="H7725"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w will|strong="H3063"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* satisfied. \w Everyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H3063"\w* eat \w the|strong="H3605"\w* flesh \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H3027"\w* \w arm|strong="H3027"\w*:
Manasseh eating Ephraim and Ephraim eating Manasseh, and they together will be against Judah. For all this his anger is not turned away, but his hand is stretched out still.
